original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields end higher, rupee at 321.50/90 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were slightly up at close on Wednesday, while the rupee closed at 321.50/90 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 28.30/60 percent, up from 28.00/30 percent at Tuesday’s close.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 26.60/90 percent, slightly up from 26.50/70 percent yesterday. (Colombo/April26/2023)
